articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Military Exercise
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Military Exercise 
						
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA), guided a flight exercise and a paratrooping drill of the Air and Anti-Air Force and Large Combined Unit 630 of the KPA.
					 He was accompanied by Choe Ryong Hae, Hyon Yong Chol, Kim Kyok Sik, Kim Yong Chun, Ri Yong Gil, Son Chol Ju, Jo Kyong Chol, Yun Tong Hyon, Ri Pyong Chol, Choe Kyong Song, Rim Kwang Il, Kang Ki Sop, Son Chong Nam, Ro Hung Se, Yun Jong Rin, Choe Pu Il, Hwang Pyong So, Ra Chong Il and Hong Yong Chil.
					
					 He gave an order to stage the exercise to the KPA's Air and Anti-Air Force and Large Combined Unit 630 to inspect their combat readiness.
					
					 He mounted an observation deck where he was briefed on the program of the exercise by its commanding officer and learned in detail about the preparedness and the influence of the bad weather on the exercise.
					
					 Under the circumstances created by Kim Jong Un, pilots promptly and accurately conducted the taking off and landing drills by using a motorway as an airfield.
					
					 Then followed a paratrooping drill.
					
					 Despite strong wind, paratroopers landed on the fixed points by applying the combat methods and actions they cultivated in their day-to-day trainings.
					
					 Kim Jong Un said their drills were carried out very well, adding that the pilots and the paratroopers successfully performed difficult missions despite very adverse weather conditions. This was the result of their good day-to-day trainings, he stressed.
					
					 "Battles are not fought depending on weather conditions and an engagement with the enemy takes place under the worst conditions", he noted.
					
					 He said that in order for soldiers to creditably discharge their missions any time and under any circumstances and conditions, they should conduct drills under the simulated conditions of an actual battle with high ideological awareness.
					
					 Underlining the need for the KPA to embody the spirit of the Enlarged Meeting of the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea in the military and political work, he called on all KPA units to raise the hot wind of training just as the anti-Japanese guerrillas did in Mt. Paektu.
					
					 The drills conducted by them this time show that it is necessary to put exercises on a scientific basis as required by a modern war, he noted, specifying ways to do so.
					
					 "As I emphasized while watching the exercise of KPA's Large Combined Unit 526, it is necessary to steadily study and round off the Korean style combat methods suited to the modern war and modernize the weaponry in order to defeat the enemy", he said.
					
					 He called on the KPA service personnel to put spurs to making preparations for going into action, keeping themselves at maximum alert at all times. 
					
					 "Once the enemies make a provocation, you should give full play to the inexhaustible combat capability to deal deadly blows at them, giving them no time to come to their senses, and blow up their strongholds of aggression," he stressed.
					
					 Kim Jong Un invited the service personnel who took part in the drills to Pyongyang that evening to have a photo taken with them.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Has Photo Taken with Participants in Meeting of Officials Guiding Party Lectures at Army
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Has Photo Taken with Participants in Meeting of Officials Guiding Party Lectures at Army
						
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, had a photo session with the participants in the meeting of officials guiding party lectures in the whole army.
					 He warmly waved back to the enthusiastic cheers of the participants.
					
					 He said that the meeting held on the significant occasion of the 35th anniversary of the first party lecture given in the presence of President Kim Il Sung marks a historic occasion of weighty significance in further strengthening the KPA into the army of the Party and the leader and the invincible revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu as required by the party and the developing revolution.
					
					 He warmly congratulated them on their successful meeting held amid great enthusiasm.
					
					 After highly praising the participants for fully devoting their wisdom and enthusiasm to strengthening the KPA as required by modeling the whole army on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, he had a photo taken with them in front of the statues of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il at the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces.
					
					 Present at the photo session were Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Pyong Sam, Kim Kyong Ok, Hwang Pyong So, Son Chol Ju and Ryom Chol Song.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Delegation of Koreans in Japan for Celebrating Day of Shining Star
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Delegation of Koreans in Japan for Celebrating Day of Shining Star
						
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with the delegation of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Friday, overflowing with compatriotic feelings.
					 The delegation is led by Pae Jin Gu, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan.

articles.title: Greetings to Sultan of Brunei
articles.content:
Greetings to Sultan of Brunei 
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Friday sent a message of greeting to Haji Hassanal Bolkiah, sultan and head of state of Brunei Darussalam, on the occasion of its national day. 
					 In the message Kim Yong Nam wished the friendly people of Brunei Darussalam bigger progress and prosperity, in the belief that the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would further develop.

articles.title: Greetings to FM of Brunei
articles.content:
Greetings to FM of Brunei
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- Pak Ui Chun, foreign minister of the DPRK, Friday sent a message of greeting to Mohamed Bolkiah, minister of Foreign Affairs and Trade of Brunei Darussalam, on its national day. 
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would further develop, and mutual cooperation in the regional and international arena, in particular, would grow stronger. It wished the government of Brunei Darussalam, country that chairs ASEAN this year, and the minister success in their work.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Brazilian Political Party Leaders
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Brazilian Political Party Leaders
						
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a message of greeting from National Chairman of the Central Committee of the Brazilian Communist Party Renato Ravello and its International Secretary Ricardo Alemao Abreu on Feb. 15.
					 The message said the Brazilian Communist Party pays respects to leader Kim Jong Il on his 71st birth anniversary.
					
					 Kim Jong Il, an outstanding revolutionary, devoted his all to building the DPRK into a state with prospering socialist economy, a state reflecting the interests and demand of the popular masses, holding high the banner of the struggle for independence against imperialism all his life, it said.
					
					 He continued advancing the Korean revolution started by President Kim Il Sung, reliably defending the socialist gains of the DPRK, it noted.
					
					 He, a patriot and internationalist, promoted the cause of the reunification and peace of Korea and friendship and solidarity among peoples, it said.
					
					 It paid respects to Kim Jong Il on behalf of the Central Committee of the Brazilian Communist Party and its members.
					
					 It expressed belief that the Korean people and the Workers' Party of Korea would follow the example of Kim Jong Il to continue adhering to independence despite the threat and attack of the imperialists and make innovations in building socialism and improving the standard of the Korean people's living.

articles.title: CPRK Secretariat Slams S. Korea for Sowing Dissension between DPRK, China
articles.content:
CPRK Secretariat Slams S. Korea for Sowing Dissension between DPRK, China 
						
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) released the following information bulletin No. 1020 Friday:
					 The south Korean group of traitors is now resorting to smear campaign of sowing dissension between the DPRK and China over the DPRK's third underground nuclear test.
					
					 The south Korean TV broadcasting Morning News on Feb. 18 aired the fake footage of "massive protest" of Chinese against the nuclear test in the DPRK.  
					
					 Explanation said that protests against the DPRK's nuclear test are now a daily occurrence in Shenyang and Guangzhou of China. But street trees were green and protesters and the police were in their summer clothes, an indication that the place is not Shenyang in the northeastern part of China which is now in mid-winter.
					
					 Letters on police clothes spelled "Chengdu patrolman" and people were fluttering Chinese flags in front of a statue portraying the Eight Route Army soldier, a clear proof that it is a video footage of anti-Japanese protest held in Chengdu, seat of Sichuan Province, not Guangzhou.
					
					 The south Korean group released the false report with the use of the video that documented a protest in the past to give impression that there was a big protest in China against the DPRK's nuclear test.
					
					 An aim sought by the south Korean regime is to sow the seed of discord between the DPRK and China in alignment with the U.S. with the DPRK's nuclear test as an occasion and get the UN adopt a "resolution on sanctions" under that pretext and thus realize its ambition for stifling the DPRK.
					
					 It is seriously mistaken, however.
					
					 From long ago, the act of sowing dissension has been regarded as the most mean and base act.
					
					 The south Korean puppet regime should clearly understand that it will get only derision and censure for its smear campaign.

articles.title: Contributors to Nuclear Test Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Contributors to Nuclear Test Visit Mangyongdae
						
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- Scientists, technicians, workers and officials in the field of national defence science and solider-builders who successfully carried out the third underground nuclear test visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung, on Friday.
					 They laid bouquets before the graves of Kim Po Hyon and Ri Po Ik, the President's grandparents, and Kim Hyong Jik and Kang Pan Sok, his parents, before paying silent tribute to them.
					
					 Then they visited the Mangyongdae Revolutionary Museum where they saw historic data and relics on the noble career of Kim Il Sung, who gave a new origin to Juche Korea and devoted all his life to the country and its people and on his family members in Mangyongdae, patriotic and revolutionary generation after generation. They also looked round historic relics preserved with care in the yard of his old home in Mangyongdae.

articles.title: Floral Baskets Sent to DPRK Missions in Different Countries
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Sent to DPRK Missions in Different Countries
						
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- Political parties, institutions and personages of different countries sent floral baskets to the DPRK missions in relevant countries on Feb. 15 and 16 to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Among them were the Commission for External Affairs of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam, Chinese economic and trading companies, the general chairperson of the Central Directive Council of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle and the chief of the Belgian branch of the Korean Friendship Association. They laid floral baskets before portraits of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and full-length paintings of them standing together.
					
					 The president of the Socialist Party of Benin sent a bouquet to the DPRK embassy in Cotonou on Feb. 14.

articles.title: Reception Given to Mark Russia's Day of Defender of Motherland
articles.content:
Reception Given to Mark Russia's Day of Defender of Motherland
						
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- Russian Ambassador to the DPRK Alexandr Timonin and Military Attache Dmitri Zheleznikov hosted a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Corps Club Friday on the occasion of the Day of Defender of the Motherland.
					 Present there on invitation were commanding officers and officers of the Korean People's Army, officials concerned and diplomatic envoys and military attaches of foreign embassies here.
					
					 Staff members of the Russian embassy attended.

articles.title: Samjigang Co-op Farm Wins Socialist Emulation
articles.content:
Samjigang Co-op Farm Wins Socialist Emulation
						
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- The Samjigang Co-op Farm, Jaeryong County, South Hwanghae Province, was awarded a citation in the name of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK Cabinet and a rotating pennant for the Juche 101 (2012) socialist emulation.
					 Agricultural workers in Migok, Sariwon City, North Hwanghae Province, Sinam, Ryongchon County and Unhung, Thaechon County, North Phyongan Province and Samjigang, Jaeryong County, South Hwanghae Province and Tongbong, Hamju County, South Hamgyong Province, waged a socialist emulation to exalt the honor of being model farms in the era of Songun, increase agricultural production and face-lift the appearance of their villages.
					
					 A meeting to review the socialist emulation was held at the Central Youth Hall on Friday and guidelines for socialist emulation for increased production in 2013 were announced.

articles.title: Performance Given for Contributors to Successful Underground Nuclear Test
articles.content:
Performance Given for Contributors to Successful Underground Nuclear Test 
						
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- The State Merited Chorus gave a performance "Korea does what it is determined to do" at the People's Theatre in Pyongyang on Friday in honor of scientists, technicians, workers, soldier-builders and officials who contributed to the successful third underground nuclear test.
					 The performance began with orchestral music and male chorus "Song of Korean People's Army". The repertoire included male choruses "The Glorious Motherland" and "The General Will Live Forever as the Sun", orchestral music and male chorus "Victors," male chorus "Peace Is Guaranteed by Arms" and mixed sextet and male chorus "People Have Single Mind".
					
					  The artistes sang of their deep reverence and feelings of thanks to the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who provided tremendous state capabilities for reliably defending the dignity and sovereignty of the nation all their life.
					
					 Choruses as powerful as song of advance for victory showed the truth that decision and pluck of the DPRK are exactly the iron faith and will of Marshal Kim Jong Un, another illustrious commander of Mt. Paektu, and that they represent the stamina and disposition of the army and people of the DPRK who are unswervingly following the path of independence, Songun and socialism despite whatever storm and stress.
					
					 Among the audience were senior party and state officials including Kim Yong Nam and Choe Yong Rim.

articles.title: Army-People Rallies Held in DPRK to Celebrate Nuclear Test
articles.content:
Army-People Rallies Held in DPRK to Celebrate Nuclear Test
						
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- Army-people rallies took place in North Hwanghae Province, Kusong and Songrim cities, Hongwon, Changsong, Anak and Changdo counties, etc. as part of the celebrations of the third underground nuclear test.
					 Attending there were officials of local party and power organs and working people's organizations, and service persons of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials and other people at industrial establishments and co-op farms, and teaches and students at universities and colleges in the localities.
					
					 The speakers said that through the nuclear test the DPRK dealt a merciless blow at the U.S., which wantonly violated its independent right to develop space, clearly showing the world the spirit that the DPRK does what it is determined to do.
					
					 Referring to the fact that all the servicepersons and people are vowing thousand-fold revenge on the U.S. and its allies, they added that stronger countermeasures would be taken in succession to cope with the escalated reckless moves of the enemies.
					
					 They also called upon all scientists and technicians to mount a more vigorous campaign to push back the frontiers of latest science and technology to propel the building of an economic power and highly civilized socialist country, with national pride and self-confidence of the successful nuclear test.

articles.title: DPRK's Possession of Nukes Is Reasonable
articles.content:
DPRK's Possession of Nukes Is Reasonable
						
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- DPRK servicepersons have categorically rejected the U.S. and other hostile forces' assertion that it is unreasonable and inappropriate for the DPRK to possess nukes.
					 "Such assertion does not make any sense and it is invalid," Ju Chol Ho, a general officer of the Korean People's Army, told KCNA in a sharp tone of voice.
					
					 He further said:
					
					 "As signatories to the Armistice Agreement, the DPRK and the U.S. are now technically at a state of war.
					
					 The U.S. and its followers have ceaselessly carried on war rehearsals in and around the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 So, it is quite natural for the DPRK, a belligerent, to have access to long-range rocket and nuke which the U.S., its warring party, already possessed in great numbers, and it is indisputable.
					
					 The DPRK is well aware of what option it should take to defend its sovereignty and dignity.
					
					 It is entitled to possess all kinds of latest weaponry the U.S. has, including A-bomb or something more powerful than it."
					
					 Kim Un Song, an officer of the KPA, said:
					
					 "It is the DPRK's steadfast will to overpower the U.S. on the strength of most powerful weapons unknown to the world.
					
					 The third nuclear test is no more than a step forward that demonstrated the will."
					
					 Ham Kuk Chol, an officer of the KPA, said:
					
					 "The arbitrariness of the hostile forces denying the legitimate right of a sovereign state without reason can never work on the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. persistent moves against the DPRK will only incite sustained display of the latter's inexhaustible strength."

articles.title: Festival of Science, Technology Held
articles.content:
Festival of Science, Technology Held 
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- There took place the 28th festival of science and technology of Kim Chaek University of Technology from Feb. 20 to 22.
					 At least 160 papers were presented to it by teachers, researchers and postgraduate students of the university. It was divided into collective panel, machine-building industry, IT and other panels.
					
					 They introduced successes and experience gained in the work for strengthening the Juche character of the independent national economy.
					
					 Special prize went to the paper from the Metal Engineering Department of the university and the first prize to papers from the Material Engineering Department and the Robot Institute and papers presented by 12 teaches and researchers.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime's Illegal Surveillance of Civilians Disclosed
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime's Illegal Surveillance of Civilians Disclosed 
						
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- A series of political gangsterism and murders by the south Korean Lee Myung Bak group of traitors has recently been opened to public.
					 The Human Rights Committee confirmed that the office for supporting the observation of ethics of government employees illegally watched civilians, violating their basic rights. The committee demanded Lee Myung Bak stop illegal surveillance of people, reinstate those who suffered from it and take necessary measures.
					
					 The Human Rights Committee of south Korea has more than 10 years of history but it is the first time that it directly made its request to the "president".
					
					 The puppet regime has been engrossed in the politically-motivated illegal surveillance of civilians while setting up a fascist dictatorial system since the first period of its office.
					
					 The regime indiscriminately investigated and watched civilians. Not only progressive reunification movement organizations and figures but those who had previously been related to the former "regimes" including ex-"presidents", law makers, director generals of major media organizations, businessmen and even ministers and vice-ministers were subject to the surveillance. Their activities were directly reported to Chongwadae.
					
					 The riff-raffs of the "Saenuri Party" systematically took over the reports of surveillance and exploited them for hurting and attacking political dissidents and opposition parties. They made no scruple of wiretapping an office of a representative of an opposition party in the building of the "National Assembly".
					
					 Last year the illegal surveillance conducted by the office for supporting the observation of ethics of government employees has become all the more pronounced. This is clearly evidenced by the fact that the cases which the persecution investigated against its will numbered 500 and that it admitted its surveillance of dozens of VIPs including ex- and incumbent law makers and chiefs of autonomous organizations.
					
					 The truth behind the death of former "president" Roh Moo Hyun, who fell victim to the illegal surveillance, was disclosed, astonishing people.
					
					 On February 20, the Seoul Central District Court punished those who pushed Roh to death and inflicted irretrievable damage to his family, stressing that it was a sheer lie that he had an account by the name of other person.
					
					 This proves that the "case of illegal fund" which the prosecution claimed as a reason of investigation was a whopping lie.
					
					 All facts prove that traitor Lee Myung Bak is a chief culprit who engineered Roh's death.

articles.title: Japanese Government's Suppression of Chongryon under Fire
articles.content:
Japanese Government's Suppression of Chongryon under Fire 
						
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- The Standing Council of the Korean Federation of Workers in Commerce in Japan made public a statement on Feb. 20 in denunciation of the Japanese conservative government's despicable suppression of Chongryon (the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan) and its discrimination against Koreans as part of its "sanctions" against the DPRK. 
					 The statement bitterly condemned Japan's unethical campaign against Chongryon and Koreans over the DPRK's third underground nuclear test conducted for self-defence. 
					
					 It went on: 
					
					 Local self-governing bodies including Kanagawa and Saitama prefectures stopped payment of subsidies to Korean schools, toeing the Japanese government's "sanctions" measure for blocking the visits of vice-chairmen of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon to their homeland. 
					
					 The Japanese government is set to ban persons' visits publicly recognized by international law and even codify national discrimination by linking with it even the issue of education of children of Koreans in Japan. This revealed that it is the unethical and national chauvinist government trampling down even the elementary human rights. 
					
					 The statement accused the Japanese government of perpetrating such unreasonable suppression as conducting a wholesale search operation against the company and house of a Korean businessman on the charge of violating the "law on foreign exchange" for the mere reason that he sent goods to the DPRK subject to "sanctions".
					
					 It urged the Japanese government to lift all unjust "sanctions" at once and fairly guarantee the Korean businessmen the right to business and ensure human rights and living of Koreans in Japan.

articles.title: Japan Urged to Lift "Sanctions" against DPRK
articles.content:
Japan Urged to Lift "Sanctions" against DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- The Central Standing Committee of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan on Wednesday released a statement in denunciation of the Japanese government's suppression of Chongryon (the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan). 
					 It said that all the officials of the union and Korean women in Japan can hardly repress their mounting anger at the Japanese government's evermore desperate campaigns against the DPRK, Chongryon and Koreans in Japan. 
					
					The Japanese government is getting frantic with suppression of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan, while playing a double-dealing trick of enforcing harsh discrimination against Koreans and resorting to the assimilation farce, far from making apology and reparation for its past crimes, the statement noted, and continued: 
					
					 The Japanese government took such unreasonable measure as banning the reentry of vice-chairmen of Chongryon into Japan after the DPRK's successful nuclear test for self-defence. 
					
					 Chongryon has always worked for the harmony of the Korean community and happy future of posterity on the principle of non-interference in other's internal affairs and law-observance. 
					
					 It is nothing but a pretext for misleading public opinion to charge that Chongryon vice-chairmen are "those who are in a position to render substantial help to the authorities of north Korea as their staff members".
					
					 The Central Standing Committee of the women's union resolutely denounces the Japanese government's base and inhumane step on behalf of all the angry Korean women in Japan. 
					
					 We will struggle in firm unity in demand of the Japanese government's apology, reparation, guarantee of human rights and right to live as descendants of the victims of Japan's colonial domination.
					
					 The Japanese government must stop at once all the unreasonable "sanctions" including additional "sanctions".

articles.title: Minju Joson Denounces S. Korean Regime for Escalating Confrontation with DPRK
articles.content:
Minju Joson Denounces S. Korean Regime for Escalating Confrontation with DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, traitor Lee Myung Bak of south Korea let loose a spate of nonsense at a "breakfast conversation" with the advisory group on diplomacy and security. He said if the DPRK continues to develop weapons, it will face "difficulty in prolonging its power".
					 At a "meeting of people's veterans" on the same day, the traitor called for "mapping out a package strategy to seduce the inhabitants in the north into change".
					
					 This is an unpardonable rhetoric of a maniac who is steeped in the ambition for confrontation with compatriots, says Minju Joson Friday in a bylined commentary.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 That the DPRK has bolstered up nuclear deterrent is for defending the dignity of the country and sovereignty of the nation from the U.S. hostile policy toward it.
					
					 Had the DPRK not bolstered its nuclear deterrent, this land would have long plunged into a war holocaust.
					
					 This being a hard fact, the group of traitors talked about the "difficulty in prolonging power" and "change of social system". This discloses its ignorance of the DPRK as well as its intention to stoke confrontation.
					
					 Such remarks are no more than the last spasm of confrontation patient on the death-bed.
					
					 The group's ambition to do harm to the DPRK is a daydream that can never come true.
					
					 All the compatriots keep account of all the treacherous and anti-reunification crimes Lee committed against the country and the nation during his tenure of office. 
					
					 Days are numbered when traitor Lee will face stern judgment by the nation.

articles.title: Era When U.S. Used to Resort to Nuclear Blackmail Is Over: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Era When U.S. Used to Resort to Nuclear Blackmail Is Over: Rodong Sinmun 
						
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- The third underground nuclear test in the DPRK clearly showed the world once again that the era when the U.S. used to make unilateral nuclear blackmail is over. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in a bylined article. 
					
					 Citing facts to prove that the U.S. has constantly blackmailed the DPRK with nukes since the last Korean War, the article goes on:
					
					 The DPRK has made every possible effort to solve the nuclear issue of the Korean Peninsula for decades. However, the U.S. nuclear threat has not reduced but increased. 
					
					 In the new century the U.S. nuclear blackmail has become all the more undisguised. The DPRK has bolstered its nuclear deterrence to cope with the U.S. ever-more pronounced nuclear threats.
					
					 If the DPRK had not accessed the nuclear deterrence, the U.S. would have already ignited a war on the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					 The DPRK's recent successful nuclear test is a natural self-defensive measure to protect the sovereignty of the country. 
					
					 It is quite just that the DPRK answered the U.S. nuclear blackmail with bolstering up the nuclear war deterrent after declaring an all-out standoff with the U.S. 
					
					 As proven by the nuclear test which fully demonstrated the excellent performance of the nuclear deterrence of the DPRK, it has made a great contribution to protecting the safety of the Korean nation and peace in Northeastern Asia and the rest of the world as a full-fledged nuclear weapons state and a country which manufactures and launches satellites. 
					
					 The U.S. should behave itself, keeping in mind that the era when it used to blackmail the DPRK with nukes is now over.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korean Warmongers Plan to Stage Joint Military Exercises
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korean Warmongers Plan to Stage Joint Military Exercises
						
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and south Korean warmongers plan to stage the joint military exercises Key Resolve and Foal Eagle for a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK across south Korea from March, according to the south Korean KBS. 
					 The plan envisages waging the exercise Foal Eagle from March 1 to April 30 and the exercise Key Resolve from March 11 to 21, to make the sky, land and seas of south Korea into theatres of war exercises against the DPRK. 
					
					 The warmongers also mull holding more than dozens of joint mobile drills during the Foal Eagle exercise. 
					
					 It was reported that the U.S. imperialist aggressor troops including at least 10 000 overseas based GIs and huge armed forces of the south Korean army and even armed forces of other countries under the helmet of UN Forces will take part in the exercises. 
					
					 It is as clear as noonday that their saber-rattling to militarily stifle the DPRK will entail grave consequences as the situation of the Korean Peninsula has now reached the worst phase owing to the anti-DPRK campaign of "sanctions" by the U.S. imperialists and their allied forces. 
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and south Korean warmongers try to disguise the joint military exercises as "annual and defensive ones" to cover up the aggressive nature as usual.
					
					 But, the aggressive nature of the warmongers obsessed with ambition for war against the DPRK can never be covered up.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korean Provocations Push Situation to Brink of War
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korean Provocations Push Situation to Brink of War
						
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime are busy staging madcap war drills in south Korea this month in their wake in January.
					 Anti-submarine naval maneuvers were kicked off in the East Sea of Korea on Feb. 19 with the U.S. forces and the south Korean puppet armed forces involved. "Winter-season combined maneuvers" of the U.S. Marines and the south Korean Marine Corps have been under way this month. A drill for gearing up for wartime operations has been staged between the U.S. 7th Air Force and the south Korean air force operational command since Feb. 12.
					
					 The 20th Division and the 55th Division of the south Korean ground force launched "a drill in biting cold" in the areas of Ryoju and Yangphyong of Kyonggi Province on Feb. 18 and it will last till Feb. 28 and its unit 6953 is now staging a ground drill in the area of Mugon-ri, Phaju City, Kyonggi Province. 
					
					 The war exercises being staged by the U.S. and south Korea in the sky, land and sea from the outset of the year are serious military provocations pushing the situation on the Korean Peninsula and in  the region to the brink of a total war as they are aimed at invading the north to all intents and purposes.
					
					 What merits attention is that these drills are under way in the areas similar to forefront areas and the north's strategic vantage points.
					
					 The programs of the drills involve river crossing, precision strike, infiltration by use of skis and mobile drills for carrying out the scenarios for invading the north.
					
					 Also involved in the drills are warships equipped with new type cruise missiles capable of striking various areas of the DPRK and Northeast Asia.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the U.S. and the south Korean group of traitors are letting loose a spate of invectives hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the  DPRK such as "calls for bringing down its social system" and "making a precision strike at the windows of the office of the north's headquarters", kicking up war atmosphere.
					
					 All these facts go to clearly prove that the military drills are the war exercises for mounting a surprise preemptive attack and nuclear war drills being staged in pursuance of their heinous hostile policy to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 The situation on the Korean Peninsula and in the region has reached an extremely dangerous phase owing to the hostile forces which are kicking up evermore frantic anti-DPRK racket over its satellite launch for peaceful purposes and its nuclear activities for self-defence.
					
					 Their noisy war drumbeats are a blatant challenge to the efforts of the international community to defend global peace and security as they are a product of their strategic scenarios to hold hegemony in the Asia-Pacific region including Northeast Asia.
					
					 Their claim that those war maneuvers are to cope with the additional provocation of the north is no more than sheer rhetoric to pass the buck for the escalating military tension on the peninsula and in the region to the DPRK and justify their acts of aggression.
					
					 If they ignite a war on this land, the army and the people of the DPRK will not miss the gold chance but deal decisive and deadly retaliatory blows at them and blow up the strongholds of aggression and thus achieve the historic victory in the war for the country's reunification.

articles.title: U.S. Forces in S. Korea Plan to Stage North-targeted War Maneuvers
articles.content:
U.S. Forces in S. Korea Plan to Stage North-targeted War Maneuvers
						
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- The Second Division of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces in south Korea plans to stage an aerial assault drill for surprise attack on the DPRK in the area of Tongduchon, Kyonggi Province from Feb. 25 to March 8.
					 It was reported that the drill would be staged under the command of inspectors from Georgia State, the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. imperialist aggressor forces staged a guided shell defense drill in a joint combat area on Feb. 1 in a coordinated operation with the south Korean puppet forces.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists are escalating the "sanctions" racket against the DPRK through war maneuvers for aggression despite protest and denunciation at home and abroad.

articles.title: Fire at S. Korean Department Store
articles.content:
Fire at S. Korean Department Store
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- A fire broke out at Dong-A Department Store in Taegu on Wednesday, according to south Korean KBS.
					 It left several people wounded and caused a property loss amounting to more than 7.3 million won.
					
					 There was panic as thousands of people took shelter and traffic in the area around the department store remained paralyzed for over one hour.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Protests against Wholesale Dismissal
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Protests against Wholesale Dismissal 
						
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- The Part-time Workers' Union at Schools of south Korea on Feb. 20 held a press conference outside the Ministry of Education, Science and Technology in protest against the "government" authorities' unreasonable wholesale dismissal, according to KBS of south Korea.
					 The educational authorities canceled contracts with about 1 000 persons among part-time members working at primary, secondary and high schools across south Korea and dismissed 910 assistant teachers in the run -up to the new school term.
					
					 At the press conference, speakers denounced the authorities for unilaterally canceling the contracts with part-time members under the pretext of lack of budget, stirring up unrest in employment.
					
					 They threatened to launch a sit-in hunger strike and stage a general strike next month unless the "government" takes a step to bring the wholesale dismissal under control.

articles.title: Fact-Finding Group for Probe into Truth about Forcible Drafting of Koreans Meets
articles.content:
Fact-Finding Group for Probe into Truth about Forcible Drafting of Koreans Meets
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- The Fact-Finding Group for the Probe into the Truth about the Forcible Drafting of Koreans held the 2013 national consultative meeting in West and East Japan on Feb. 2 and 9.
					 The meeting heard reports on activities in 2012 from representatives of various parts of Japan and discussed an orientation of their activities for this year.
					
					 The group set it as its goal to let broader strata of Japanese citizens  and Koreans living in Japan know about the essence of social and historic issues which the Japanese government distorts and conceals and build up public opinion on them and encourage them to conduct positive activities for the termination of the human rights abuses and the withdrawal of the policy of national discrimination against the victims of Japan's  colonial rule and their descendents this year.
					
					 This year marks the 90th anniversary of the Japanese imperialists' massacre of Koreans during the great Kanto quake and the 65th anniversary of the April 24 action for education.
					
					 The group clarified its plan to survey the remains of victims of the Japanese imperialists' forcible drafting and stage actions for settling the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army and the issue of supporting Korean schools.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Carried in Organ of British Political Party
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Carried in Organ of British Political Party
						
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- The gist of the New Year Address made by the dear respected Kim Jong Un was carried in the February-March issue of Proletarian, the organ of the Communist Party of Great Britain (Marxist-Leninist).

articles.title: British Political Party Accuses U.S. of Its Hostility toward DPRK
articles.content:
British Political Party Accuses U.S. of Its Hostility toward DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Communist Party of Great Britain (Marxist-Leninist) issued a statement in denunciation of the U.S. moves to stifle the DPRK.
					 It said:
					
					 After the DPRK's successful satellite launch, the United States instigated the UN Security Council to fabricate a "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK.
					
					 It is a mistake for the hostile forces to try to do harm to the DPRK with sanctions and pressure.
					
					 The U.S. will not be able to escape a shameful defeat as in the past.
					
					 In the light of the fact that the U.S. remains unchanged in its hostile policy toward the DPRK, the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula is impossible without the denuclearization of the world.
					
					 Due to the U.S. increasing hostile policy toward the DPRK, the six-party talks and the September 19 joint statement can no longer exist.
					
					 There will only be a dialogue for ensuring peace and stability of the Korean Peninsula and the region, but not a dialogue for discussing the denuclearization of the peninsula.
					
					 The DPRK will bolster up its military power for self-defense in every way including the nuclear deterrence to cope with the U.S. evermore undisguised moves to stifle it.
					
					 The DPRK has a legitimate right to beef up its nuclear deterrence to meet the constant threats posed by the imperialists.
					
					 The statement was carried in the February-March issue of Proletarian, the organ of the Communist Party of Great Britain (Marxist-Leninist).

articles.title: Seminars on Kim Jong Il's Exploits Held in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Seminars on Kim Jong Il's Exploits Held in Foreign Countries 
						
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- Seminars on leader Kim Jong Il's feats took place in Russia, India and Pakistan between Feb. 12 and 14.
					 Demskov, editor-in-chief of the Patriot of Russia, said in his speech that Kim Jong Il performed great exploits for the human cause of independence.
					
					 He turned the DPRK into a military power in a short span of time despite difficulties, said Demskov, adding:
					
					 The successful launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2 was the fruition of the much pains taken by Kim Jong Il, who devoted his all to the prosperity of the country and nation.
					
					 Wipin Gupta, chairman of the Juche Philosophy Study Committee of India, lauded Kim Jong Il as an outstanding thinker and theoretician, great statesman, iron-willed brilliant commander and defender of socialism.
					
					 At a time when socialism faced a serious crisis in the late 20th century, Kim Jong Il proved the scientific accuracy and truth of socialism and its inevitable victory to give confidence to the progressive people, the chairman added.
					
					 Chairman Shahida Wijarat and Secretary General Javed Ansari of the Society for the Study of Self-Reliance of Pakistan and other speakers said the revolutionary life of Kim Jong Il shines with the exploits he performed by preserving and glorifying the idea of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by British Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by British Organizations
						
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- The conferment of the title of Generalissimo of the DPRK to leader Kim Jong Il was an expression of the Korean people's boundless reverence for him.
					 The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea said this in a joint statement on Feb. 14.
					
					 The statement said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il developed the Korean People's Army founded by Generalissimo Kim Il Sung into invincible armed forces and honorably defended the sovereignty and socialism of the DPRK with his Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 Kim Jong Il made great contributions to peace and security of the Korean Peninsula and the rest of the world.
					
					 With his Songun leadership, he turned the DPRK into a socialist power possessed of nuclear deterrence and led to victory the showdown with the U.S., performing great exploits for the Korean revolution and the world revolution.
					
					 We are significantly greeting the first anniversary of the conferment of the title of Generalissimo to Kim Jong Il, who devoted his whole life to accomplishing the Songun revolutionary cause.

articles.title: Russian Papers Mark Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary
articles.content:
Russian Papers Mark Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary
						
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- Russian newspapers carried special write-ups on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They carried photos of a smiling Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Feb. 7th issue of Nakhodkinski Rabochi in its article "Leader Kim Jong Il was a patriot" said:
					
					 He turned the DPRK into a politico-military power and socialist fortress with his ceaseless field guidance under the uplifted banner of Songun toward the end of the last century.
					
					 The DPRK ranked itself among several countries that manufacture and launch satellite and nuclear weapons states in the world thanks to his painstaking efforts and dedication. A bright prospect has opened for the country to attain the goal of a thriving socialist nation in the near future.
					
					 The Feb. 5th issue of Konkurent in an article titled "The Juche idea and Kim Jong Il" said:
					
					 He, basing himself long ago on all-round analysis and review of the history of the working-class struggle, solemnly declared the Juche idea as Kimilsungism, a new and unique idea which can be called only by the august name of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 It is quite natural that the revolutionary idea of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il is called Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, immortal banner for accomplishing the human cause of independence.
					
					 The 6th issue of Veteran carried an article titled "On the occasion of the birth anniversary of Comrade Kim Jong Il, patriot loved by the people."
					
					 The Feb. 6th issue of Vladivostok in an article titled "The road covered by the DPRK" said that the Korean people will win one victory after another, holding in high esteem the dear respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un identical to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: British Organizations Support DPRK's Successful Nuclear Test
articles.content:
British Organizations Support DPRK's Successful Nuclear Test
						
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association made public a joint statement on Feb. 12 to hail the DPRK's successful third underground nuclear test.
					 The statement said that the recent nuclear test is a very just step taken by the DPRK to firmly protect its sovereignty from the extreme moves of the U.S. imperialists and their followers denying its independent right to space development for peaceful purposes.
					
					 They are getting evermore desperate in their moves to stifle socialism of the DPRK, it noted, adding:
					
					 The U.S., which has conducted most of nuclear tests in the world and shipped many nuclear weapons into south Korea, has no qualification to talk about the DPRK's nuclear test.
					
					 Other countries which accuse the DPRK's nuclear test also keep many nukes.
					
					 If the U.S. and its followers truly want peace on the Korean Peninsula, they should retract the UN Security Council's "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK and immediately withdraw aggression forces from south Korea.

articles.title: Peruvian Personages Hail DPRK's Nuclear Test
articles.content:
Peruvian Personages Hail DPRK's Nuclear Test
						
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- Peruvian personages hailed the DPRK's successful third underground nuclear test on Feb. 13.
					 Tani Baler Lopera, international secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Peru (Red Motherland), said that the DPRK ranked itself among satellite manufacturing and launching countries and nuclear powers recognized by the world thanks to the Songun politics formulated by Generalissimo Kim Jong Il and carried forward by the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The chairman of the Peruvian Committee for Remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il noted that no force on earth can encroach upon the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK which is holding Kim Jong Un, brilliant Songun commander, as supreme leader.
					
					 Roberto Carbonel Pezo, chairman of the Peru-Korea Friendship Institute for Study of the Juche Based Songun Policy, said no one can take issue with the nuclear test conducted by the DPRK to protect its sovereignty and dignity as it is its legitimate measure for self-defence.
					
					 Yuri Castro Romero, secretary general of the Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship, said that the DPRK's successful nuclear test is a great event of encouraging not only all Korean people but all revolutionaries and anti-imperialist fighters in the world.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre campo de construccion de Museo de Victoria en Guerra
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre campo de construccion de Museo de Victoria en Guerra 
						
Pyongyang, 22 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea recorrio el campo de reconstruccion del Museo Conmemorativo de la Victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria.
					El Comandante Supremo fue acogido por los comandantes de las unidades movilizadas en esta obra.
					
					Al visitarla en julio del ano pasado, el propuso reconstruir conforme a la demanda de la epoca del Songun ese museo, que tiene gran importancia en continuar el espiritu de combate de las generaciones antecedentes y fijo en el terreno el solar para este fin y encargo la obra al EPC.
					
					El Mariscal averiguo en detalles el estado de reconstruccion por parte de los comandantes de unidades.
					
					Destaco la necesidad de hacer bien la construccion de la jamba del museo en la obra.
					
					Tras ver el proyecto de formacion del patio de educacion como area verde, dijo que una vez terminada la obra el patio sera mejor a la vista.
					
					Evaluo a los militares que realizaron en un corto tiempo la obra de formacion del area de cespedes tras excavar miles de metros cubicos de tierra helada y pavimentada.
					
					Enfatizo la necesidad de hacer bien el arreglo del ambiente de contornos como la plantacion de arboles y establecer bien el sistema de  irrigacion y desague.
					
					Al ver el plan de formacion del campo de exposicion de armas al aire libre, dio las instrucciones concernientes a levantarlo bien.
					
					Contemplando el paisaje del campo de construccion, quedo muy satisfecho varias veces diciendo que es mejor el sitio del museo y el proyecto de su formacion.
					
					Mirando un buen tiempo la estatua "victoria", tema principal del Monumento a la Victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, pregunto sobre el creador de la estatua.
					
					Se informo del estado de la produccion y elaboracion de piedras y dio en detalles los remedios para la elaboracion de piedras.
					
					Al recorrer el campo de construccion de dique, en que se exhibira el barco espia armado norteamericano "Pueblo" capturado por las fuerzas navales del EPC cuando se infiltraba en las aguas jurisdiccionales de la Republica, aclaro los temas presentados en la obra.
					
					El Mariscal paso revista al edificio principal del Museo.
					
					Cuando estuvo en el hall, donde se levantara la estatua de pie del Generalisimo Kim Il Sung, evaluo el proyecto de su formacion.
					
					En el hall de segundo piso y el otro circular, insistio en la necesidad de hacer bien la construccion conforme al aspecto y el caracter del museo.
					
					Asevero que el museo es la base de educacion  que arma a todos los militares del EPC, trabajadores, jovenes y estudiantes en la idea Juche, la ideologia revolucionaria antiimperialista y el destacado arte de mando militar, las estrategias y tacticas militares del Presidente.
					
					Recalco la necesidad de terminar la construccion del Museo antes del 60o aniversario de la victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria para glorificar generacion tras generacion las inmortales proezas del Presidente y el espiritu de defensa a ultranza al lider y la patria de nuestros militares y civiles que se puso de manifiesto en la decada de 1950.
					
					El Mariscal fue acompanado por el vicemariscal del EPC, Choe Ryong Hae, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige ejercicios tacticos de ataque de subunidad  de unidad 526 del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige ejercicios tacticos de ataque de subunidad  de unidad 526 del EPC
						
Pyongyang, 22 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio los ejercicios tacticos de ataque acompanados del tiro de combate, realizados por una subunidad adscrita a la gran unidad combinada 526 del EPC.
					El fue acogido en el terreno por los comandantes de la gran unidad combinada.
					
					En el puesto de vigilancia escucho las explicaciones sobre el plan de ejercicios que le ha brindado el comandante de la maniobra.
					
					Dio la orden de iniciar los ejercicios.
					
					Cuando se disparo el cartucho de senal, resono el trompeteo de ataque y abrieron fuego las armas de fuego de diferentes tipos.
					
					Tras tomar de un tiron las trincheras del "enemigo", los militares dispararon los cartuchos de senal desde las lomas ocupadas coreando las vivas.
					
					El Comandante Supremo evaluo altamente la exitosa marcha de la maniobra.
					
					Dijo que los ejercicios de hoy comprobaron que el EPC levanta la ola de entrenamiento aceptando ideologicamente el espiritu de la reciente reunion ampliada de la Comision Militar Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					Presento las tareas importantes para perfeccionar los preparativos de combate del EPC acorde a la demanda de la situacion creada.
					
					Destaco la necesidad de seguir prestando profunda atencion al fortalecimiento del EPC para llevar a feliz termino de generacion en generacion la causa revolucionaria del Juche, la del Songun, iniciada en las selvas del monte Paektu.
					
					Dio la indicacion de formar a todos los oficiales y soldados como combatientes que tengan asimilados la invencible estrategia y tacticas de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il, el intrepido modo de ataque y la perfecta capacidad de combate real.
					
					Para vencer a los enemigos, es importante estudiar y mejorar sin parar los metodos de combate al estilo coreano en lo conveniente a la guerra moderna, apunto y prosiguio que si estalla la guerra, hay que atacar duro a los enemigos sin darles el tiempo de reponerse.
					
					Los militares del EPC deben tener siempre presente que deben pelear tarde o temprano con los enemigos, dijo instruyendoles impulsar los preparativos de combate manteniendose en el estado de movilizacion.
					
					Subrayo que en los fusiles de oficiales y soldados del EPC se palpa la determinacion de responder con el fuego al fuego y castigar implacablemente a los agresores que se atrevan a hacer dano a la RPDC, y ordeno que eliminen inmediata y despiadadamente a los enemigos, si estos dan algun movimiento sospechoso, con esos fusiles de justicia y venganza.
					
					El Mariscal fue acompanado en esta ocasion por Choe Ryong Hae, Hyon Yong Chol, Kim Kyok Sik, Ri Yong Gil, Son Chol Ju, Ryom Chol Song, Yun Tong Hyon, Pang Kwan Bok, Yun Tong Hui, Hwang Pyong So y Hong Yong Chil.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un se fotografia con participantes en reunion
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un se fotografia con participantes en reunion 
						
Pyongyang, 22 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, tomo una fotografia de recuerdo con los participantes en la reunion de los funcionarios directivos de cursillos del partido de todo el ejercito.
					El Mariscal envio cordial saludo a los participantes que le aclamaban.
					
					Senalo que la reunion, celebrada con motivo del dia significativo en que se cumplen 35 anos del primer cursillo del partido efectuado con la participacion del Presidente Kim Il Sung, deviene una ocasion historica de suma importancia para fortalecer el EPC como invencibles fuerzas armadas revolucionarias del partido, el lider y del monte Paektu conforme a las demandas del partido y la revolucion en desarrollo.
					
					Y felicito calidamente a los participantes que concluyeron con exito la reunion con elevado afan.
					
					Evaluo altamente las proezas de los participantes, quienes dedican toda su inteligencia y pasion para fortalecer el EPC acorde a la demanda de la causa de transformacion de todo el ejercito segun el kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo, y se fotografio con ellos ante las estatuas de bronce de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il erguidas en el Ministerio de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares.
					
					Participaron con el Mariscal en la filmacion Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Pyong Sam, Kim Kyong Ok, Hwang Pyong So, Son Chol Ju y Ryom Chol Song.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al sultan de Brunei Darussalam
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al sultan de Brunei Darussalam
						
Pyongyang, 22 de febrero (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 22 un mensaje de felicitacion a Haji Hassanal Bolkiah, sultan y jefe de Estado de Brunei Darussalam, con motivo del Dia Nacional de este pais.
					El remitente desea al amistoso pueblo de Brunei Darussalam mayor progreso y prosperidad y expresa la conviccion de que se desarrollaran mas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises.
